title: Core Competency Development Program for Library Education Librarians

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Educational program for adolescents preparing for professional careers, designed to understand the role of library education specialists and explore required competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain four core competencies of library education librarians: collaboration, instructional design, leadership, and subject-matter expertise.
Learners can produce educational materials applying instructional design principles to real-world library work scenarios.
Learners can evaluate library education librarian competencies required by the current industry through job advertisement analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
